items.summary: Update the X39 Matrix launch hero block so that all green-colored accents are replaced with a celestial sky blue color, while keeping the existing red accents unchanged. This includes (but is not limited to) Tailwind classes like `text-green-*`, `border-green-*`, `from-green-*` gradients, and any inline green glow/text-shadow RGBA values used inside `frontend/src/components/X39MatrixLaunchHeroBlock.tsx`.

Update the launch ambient effects code-rain so that any green particle color is replaced with a celestial sky blue color, keeping the red particles unchanged, in `frontend/src/components/X39MatrixLaunchAmbientEffects.tsx`.
